topbar.copy.title: Get Rewarded With Referrals!
topbar.copy.description: Refer a friend now and receive 0.2% of their bets! Send above link to them and your account will automatically be added as a referrer when they bet.
modal.login.title: Please Log In first
modal.login.description: Connect to Scatter to retrieve username and account related values.
modal.unstake.title: Reclaim Options
modal.unstake.description: There are a few options offered to reclaim your BETX. Wanna reclaim faster? Choose one from below!
modal.unstake.option1.title: Instant
modal.unstake.option1.text: You will be able to withdraw staked tokens in 15 sec. 40% of reclaimed BETX will be burned.
modal.unstake.option2.title: 2X Faster
modal.unstake.option2.text: It takes 36 hours to withdraw staked tokens. 20% of reclaimed BETX will be burned.
modal.unstake.option3.title: Regular
modal.unstake.option3.text: It takes 72 hours to withdraw staked tokens. You will receive full amount of reclaimed BETX.
dice.reward.firstbet: Bet over 1 EOS to win {amount} BETX (distributed 20:00 UTC daily)
dice.reward.firstbet.tooltip: This reward can only apply to each account once, and will be distributed daily at 16:00 UTC (00:00 Beijing Time). If you have any question, please join our Telegram group.
dice.play.autoTool: WARNING:Turning Auto Bet on will result in your bet continuing to be placed until Auto Bet is turned off.There may be a slight delay when turning Auto Bet off that results in an additional roll
modal.fair.title: Rules & Fairness
modal.fair.description:
A fair bet requires an unbiased random number.
What BETX does is to put the two seeds (Player Seed & House Seed) generated respectively by the player and the House, on an open-source smart contract which generates an ultimate random number based on the two seeds.
Mathematically, this ultimate random number is determined by both parties, thus ensuring fairness. The House publishes the hash of the House Seed before the Player bets, and the Player can verify the House hash after the roll, thereby proving that the House is not cheating.
faq.title: FAQ
faq.account.title.1: How do I create a BETX account?
faq.account.text.1: If you already have an EOS account, simply use your EOS wallet to log in. If you don't, click Help and follow the simple account creation steps.
faq.account.text.2: If you have an EOS wallet, you can log in directly through Scatter or Wallet App. Platform account creation and deposit are not available at the moment
faq.game.title.1: How to participate in the game?
faq.game.text.1:
1. Log in with Scatter at the homepage
2. Select the number you want to bet on 
3. Enter the amount of the bet 
4. Once you have confirmed everything is correct, click on 'Bet'
faq.game.text.2: You can view your bet history from the bottom 'My Bet' tab
faq.fairness.title.1: Can the game prove its fairness?
faq.fairness.text.1: The game is delivered by the EOS smart contract, and the random number is calculated based on the user's blockchain data (block hash). Players can use the receipt seed of the gambling to verify the fairness of the gambling and ensure that the game is fair and equitable.
faq.fairness.title.2: What should I do if I really want to verify that what you say is true?
faq.fairness.text.2: We will open source our smart contract code once the game runs smoothly. Feel free to research our smart contract on Github. If you have any questions or hesitation, please contact us via Telegram, Twitter or email.
faq.dividend.title.1: How to get dividends from BETX platform?
faq.dividend.text.1: You can check out the dividend distribution page from top navigation bar 'Stake'
faq.dividend.text.2:
The user can obtain the platform's dividend by staking one's token on the platform. 50% of platform revenus goes to dividends distribution. We will take a snapshot of staking amount at 04:00 AM UTC +8 daily and calculate dividends using POS method. The platform introduces the Coin-days as the equity measurement standard. The core idea is that the more BETX a user holds and the longer the holding time, the greater dividend he will obtain from the platform.
 My effective snapshot total = Min(my snapshot total, 3 times the staked tokens) 
 Platform effective snapshot total = Users effective snapshot total
faq.dividend.text.3: The platform's first dividend distribution will be after the 2.5% tokens mined, and the next day in Beijing time(UTC + 8) 04:00 AM execution of the last round of snapshots and dividend distribution.
faq.token.text.0:
The BETX token is an equity certificate for the BETX. FUN platform.  0 pre-digging , 0 fundraising , 100%belonging to the community.
Total BETX token issuance: 6600000000 (6.6 billion)
faq.token.text.2:
90% of game mining
10% of community award (Only for community development )
faq.token.title.3: Description of the game mining rules
faq.token.text.3:
The platform adopts the mode of 'gambling is mining'. Players can get 30 tokens for each EOS gambling. The mining bonus decreases with the amount of token released, and every 2% of the token released triggers the decrease of the mining bonus. 
Game Mining Bonus = Decrement Times/ (Decrement Times +1)*Last Round Game Reward
faq.bounty.text.1: The platform will use 1% of the token for the initial marketing operations of the platform. Covers BUG reports, BETX platform promotion and other related expenses. BETX guarantees that community reward tokens are only used for platform ecological construction, and will never participate in platform dividends. The remaining 9% of community reward tokens will be conducted by community and team voting community autonomy, and players can monitor token usage by accessing thebetxowner account on the blockchain browser.
faq.bounty.text.2:
The bug report can tell us what we don't realize, and discover new features that we may not have thought of, which can help us feel how users use our software, so that we can provide better service to users. 
We reward 500 BETX tokens for each reporter who discovers bugs. For each serious bug report, especially the loss of the platform, we will reward the reporter 50000 BETX.
faq.bounty.text.3: BETX will use some of the community reward tokens for platform community building and event rewards.
faq.profit.text.1: 50% of the platform's revenue will distributed to BETX token holders. We hope that the BETX ecosystem will continue to grow and develop, so we will share the maximum profit of the platform to the participants of the platform. Users holding tokens can receive dividends by pledge tokens.
faq.profit.text.2:
30% of the platform's revenue flows into the prize pool. The prize pool is the platform's infrastructure, and if there is no huge prize pool, the user's gambling amount will be limited. As the prize pool increases, we will gradually reduce the prize pool and expand the number of benefits modules for users. 
We tentatively expand the module to have 'Token Bank', Real-time trading rankings and so on
BETX promises that all the revenue from the prize pool module will be backed up to the community for platform infrastructure and community welfare activities.
faq.profit.text.3: 20% of the platform's revenue is allocated to the development and operations teams. Assist the team to improve the functions of the BETX platform, deploy new games, welfare systems, enhance platform user experience, and provide code support for funding.
faq.term.title: Responsible Gambling
faq.term.body:
Gmabling Control recommendations：
We believe that gambling should always be an enjoyable leisure activity. Remembering these simple tips can help make sure your gambling doesn’t become a problem.
1. Gambling should be entertaining and not seen as a way of making money.
2. Bet sensibly and never chase your losses.
3. Only gamble what you can afford to lose.
4. Balance gambling with other activities. If gambling is your only form of entertainment think about whether you are still having fun.
5. Take regular breaks from gambling. Gambling continuously can cause you to lose track of time and perspective. 
6.Don’t gamble when under the influence of alcohol or when you’re upset or depressed.
stake.title: BETX Staking & Dividend
stake.subtitle: Dividend Today
stake.rule.title: Dividend & Stake Rules
stake.rule.body1: The BETX platform pioneered POS dividends and introduced Coin-days as a measure of equity. The core idea is that the more BETX a user holds and the longer the holding time, the greater dividend he will obtain from the platform.
stake.rule.body2: User's first dividend = My effective snapshot total / Platform effective snapshot total * total platform dividend
stake.rule.body3: the platform's first dividend distribution will be after the first 2.5% tokens mined at 04:00 AM Beijing time (UTC + 8) the next day.
